value.title: Iron Ox raises $20 million to grow robotic greenhouse operations
value.excerpt: Iron Ox plans to expand its robotic growing solution to greenhouses in California and other parts of the U.S. after a $20 million series B funding round.

value.title: US Air Force tests ‘unstoppable’ robot dogs to defend bases

value.title: Stephen Hawking was wrong about AI killing humans (says robot)
value.excerpt: Instead, this is GPT-3, an Open AI robot that's just written a column for The Guardian. And what a column. "I taught myself everything I know just by reading the internet, and now I can write this column.

value.title: Future of Defense: Artificial Intelligence, Robotics Driving Modern Day Military
value.excerpt: With 5G, advanced satellite communication and integration of artificial intelligence and robotics, the future defense system may need minimal human intervention.

value.title: The Guardian’s GPT-3-generated article is everything wrong with AI media hype
value.excerpt: The Guardian today published an article purportedly written "entirely" by OpenAI's GPT-3. But the the newspaper's grand claims aren't all they seem.

value.title: How Diffblue uses AI to automate unit testing for Java applications
value.excerpt: On Tuesday Diffblue announced general availability of its flagship Diffblue Cover and Diffblue Cover: Community Edition, a free version created for developers using IntelliJ, the most popular IDE for enterprise Java.

value.title: 4 Robotics ETFs to Buy as AI Tightens Grip Over All Spheres of Life
value.excerpt: We are living in an era largely dominated by AI applications and technological advancements. Amid the coronavirus crisis, demand for online services has increased which in turn has led to the dominance of the AI.

value.title: From robots to 3D printing, transformation in manufacturing has lead to efficiencies, and also worries over future employment
value.excerpt: Transformation in manufacturing is well underway as robots, AI, and drones become factory fixtures. Some are concerned about leaving workers behind.

value.title: Robots found to ease loneliness in older people in care homes
value.excerpt: Culturally competent” robots could improve mental health and reduce loneliness in older people, a new study has found.

value.title: Nigeria to establish centre for artificial intelligence, robotics
value.excerpt: The National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA) has said it is set to establish a Centre for Artificial Intelligence and Robotics in Nigeria.

value.title: Space the place for Irish AI chip as PhiSat-1 satellite blasts off
value.excerpt: An artificial intelligence (AI) processing chip developed in Ireland has been included on board a satellite that blasted off into space from French Guiana early this morning. The PhiSat-1 is the first European satellite carrying out an experiment to demonstrate how on-board deep-learning technology can speed up the rate at which observation data is processed and transmitted to Earth.

value.title: NITDA set to establish centre for Artificial Intelligence, robotics
value.excerpt: In a bid to achieve a robust digital economy, the NITDA is set to establish a Centre for Artificial Intelligence and Robotics.

value.excerpt: The PhiSat-1 is the first European satellite carrying out an experiment to demonstrate how onboard deep learning technology can speed up the rate at which observation data is proessed and transmitted back to Earth.

value.title: Invest in Miso Robotics Now for the Kitchen of the Future
value.excerpt: Miso Robotics is focused on two red-hot areas of technology: artificial intelligence (AI) and yes, robotics. This helps explain why the startup has been so successful with its equity crowdfunding campaign.

value.title: NITDA plans centre for artificial intelligence, robotics
value.excerpt: In an effort to achieve a robust digital economy, the National Information Technology Development Agency, (NITDA) is set to establish a Centre for Artificial Intelligence and Robotics in Nigeria (CFAIR).

value.title: XRobotics is keeping the dream of pizza robots alive
value.excerpt: Zume pulled the plug on its robotic pizza wing earlier this year. A lot goes into making a decision like that — particularly for a company whose robotic dreams were a press darling for a while there.

value.title: Elon Musk unveils updated Neuralink brain implant design and surgical robot
value.excerpt: Elon Musk's neuroscience startup Neuralink has revealed the "dramatically simplified" design for an implant that aims to create brain-to-machine interfaces, alongside the robot that will insert it and several pigs that have the device installed.

value.title: Electronic skin that ‘feels’ pain could lead to smarter prosthetics and robots

value.title: Sarcos Robotics raises $40 million to develop an exoskeleton for industrial applications
value.excerpt: Sarcos Robotics, a startup developing robots for industrial and defense applications, today nabbed $40 million in equity financing.

value.title: Wearable robot company marches to big raise
value.excerpt: There's are two reasons I've written glowingly about a Utah-based robotics company called Sarcos, which just locked in an additional $40M in Series C funding. The first is the company's pragmatic approach to becoming a key automation supplier in the near-term.

value.title: Amazon’s top robotics engineer joins AI startup Scale
value.excerpt: Amazon.com Inc’s top robotics engineer, who recently defended the company’s warehouse working conditions, left to join the artificial intelligence startup Scale AI Inc.
